attr.title: Viral Reload
attr.desc: Viral Reload is an Infinite Wave based shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic. Blast away at deadly viruses and mechanical hybrids, as well as 2 unique bosses. Dash through bullets, lasers, and enemies to stay alive and score!
attr.inst: You can purchase Humming Out at: https://retrocademedia.itch.io/viral-reload. Download the Linux version and extract it, and place the *Viral Reload.pck* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the *Viral Reload Linux.zip*, Jan 26, 2022 release.
